articles.description: Arne Slot's new-look Liverpool got their grand unveiling in the Community Shield defeat by Crystal Palace at Wembley - and the reviews are in.
articles.title: Liverpool: Arne Slot's new-look Reds launched at Wembley - with bugs to fix

articles.description: All the reaction and analysis as Crystal Palace beat Liverpool on penalties at Wembley to win the Community Shield.
articles.title: Community Shield reaction as Crystal Palace beat Liverpool on penalties

articles.description: Crystal Palace are unsuccessful in their appeal against being demoted from the Europa League and will play in the Conference League this season.
articles.title: Crystal Palace lose appeal against demotion from Europa League to Conference League

articles.description: Justin Rose beats JJ Spaun in a nail-biting play-off to win the St Jude Championship for his first PGA title in more than two years.
articles.title: St Jude Championship: Justin Rose beats JJ Spaun in play-off as Tommy Fleetwood denied

articles.description: Travis Hunter shows up well, Patrick Mahomes may have a new minder and rookie quarterbacks have differing fortunes in their pre-season openers.
articles.title: NFL pre-season review & results: Hunter, Sanders & Dallas Cowboys

articles.description: Tottenham express interest in signing Brazil winger Savinho during talks with Manchester City.
articles.title: Tottenham open talks with Manchester City to sign Brazil winger Savinho

articles.description: Everton are progressing in talks to sign Jack Grealish on a season-long loan deal from Manchester City.
articles.title: Jack Grealish: Everton talks progress over Manchester City winger

articles.description: Crystal Palace chairman Steve Parish says the club will reluctantly sell Marc Guehi this summer if he refuses to sign a new contract.
articles.title: Marc Guehi: Crystal Palace captain could be sold, says chairman Steve Parish

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot does not believe that Crystal Palace fans intended to disrupt the minute's silence held in remembrance of Diogo Jota and Andre Silva before the Community Shield.
articles.title: Crystal Palace fans disrupting Jota silence had 'no bad intention', says Arne Slot

articles.description: A second Japanese boxer has died from brain injuries suffered during separate bouts at the same event in Tokyo.
articles.title: Hiromasa Urakawa: Second Japanese boxer from Tokyo event dies from brain injury
